tool_description: Smart Validation & Correction for Swiss Addresses. It offers real-time autocomplete suggestions for cities, streets, and postal codes, making data entry swift and error-free. Additionally, the feature for correcting existing address records with precise accuracy up to the house number level. This ensures high-quality data management and reliable address information for businesses and organizations, streamlining operations and improving customer interactions.
name: AddressPerfect Swiss Streets
title: AddressPerfect Swiss Streets

api_list.name: Get Zipcode List
api_list.description:
Get a list of Zipcodes for Swiss Addresses starting with the prefix `zip`.
You can optionally restrict the search with a city.

If no city is provided, zipcode must be at least 2 characters long 

If you provide a zip code prefix, the result will be a list of zip codes  starting with the prefix. 
If provided, City must be the whole city name  (as provided by /getcitylist). Partial city names are not matched.

api_list.name: Validate Address
api_list.description:
A full Swiss address is validated and corrected if possible. 

The Flag field indicates the type of correction that was applied to the address.

* 0 - Nothing found, address invalid
* 1 - Address found, no correction applied
* 2 - Address found, correction applied
* 3 - Just Zip code and City could be validated, no correction applied on street

HnrValid flag will be 0 for invalid (not confirmed) house numbers and 1 for confirmed house numbers.

Rating fields indicate the confidence level of the result on field level and overall. Values are from 0 to 100.

api_list.name: Autocomplete (Full Text search)
api_list.description:
Provides an unstructured,  full text search functionality over the addresses of a specific country.

 Returns the structured matches in the order of relevance.

Return value is a list of `AddressResponse` objects with the relevant fields filled in. There is no
House number validation for this endpoint.

```
AddressResponse = {
		"Street": STRING,
		"Street_Long": STRING,
		"Hnr": STRING,
		"Zipcode": STRING,
		"City": STRING,
		"Country": STRING,
		"HnrValid": INT,
		"Flag": INT,
		"FlagText": STRING,
		"RatingOverall": INT,
		"RatingStr":  INT,
		"RatingZIP": INT,
		"RatingCity": INT,
}
```

Country.title: Country
Country.description: Result Country ISO code (same as input)

RatingZIP.title: Ratingzip
RatingZIP.description: ZIP code confidence value from 0% to 100%

api_list.name: Get Streetnames List
api_list.description:
Get a list of Streets for Swiss Addresses. 
If no other fields are provided, the results are a list of country-wide street names starting with the provided prefix.
Optionally, a zip code or a city can be provided for narrowing down the results.

Street must be at least 2 characters long 
If you provide a city and/or a zip code, the result will be a list of streets in that city and/or zip code.

api_list.name: Get Cities List
api_list.description:
Get a list of Cities for auto-completing a Swiss city field. You can optionally filter with zipcode.

If no zip code is provided, city must be at least 2 characters long 

If you provide a city prefix, the result will be a list of cities starting with the prefix. 
Zipcode must be the zipcode (as provided by /getziplist). Partial zip codes are not matched.
